JNums

Class Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • JNums.Stats

  • public class Stats
extends java.lang.Object
    Helps to calculate statistical measures over samples: means, stdevs Possibility to filter data is included

    • Method Detail

      • Freq

        public static double Freq(double x)
        Calculation of CDF Computation of the normal frequency function freq(x).

        Freq(x) = (1/sqrt(2pi)) Integral(exp(-t^2/2))dt between -infinity and x

        \Phi(x) = \frac{1}{2\pi} \int_(-\infty)^(x) (e^(-frac{t^2}{2})) \cdot dt

        Parameters:
        x - variable
        Returns:
        freq(x)

      • nextRandNorm

        public static double nextRandNorm()

      • NormInvertedDirection

        public static double NormInvertedDirection(double x,
                                           double m,
                                           double s)
        NormInvertedDirection: output = [-1;1];
        Parameters:
        x - - double variable distributed with Norm(m,s)
        m - - double mean of Norm(m,s)
        s - - double stdev of Norm(m,s)
        Returns:
        double 2*Freq(x)-1 corresponding to x given Norm(m,s)

      • stdn

        public static double stdn(double[] a)
        Standard deviation of the sample
        Parameters:
        a - double-array of sample data
        Returns:
        stdev of the sample

      • stdn

        public static double stdn(double[] arr,
                          boolean[] filter)
        Standard deviation of the sample
        Parameters:
        arr - double-array of sample data
        filter - boolean filter applied to arr. Both must be of the same size
        Returns:
        double stdev of the sample
